and exists( select sc.commodity_id from bmall.shop_commodity sc INNER JOIN bmall.user u ON sc.shop_id = u.ID WHERE u.ID = #{userId} AND sc.commodity_id = c.id)

SELECT c.name FROM bmall.commodity c INNER JOIN bmall.order_commodity oc ON c.ID = oc.COMMODITY_ID INNER JOIN bmall.order o ON o.id=oc.ORDER_ID WHERE o.issueTime between #{dateBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{dateEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY SUM(oc.quantity) DESC LIMIT 10
